title: Virtual Lecture: Rosalba Carriera’s A Young Lady with a Parrot
title_display: Virtual Lecture: Rosalba Carriera’s A Young Lady with a Parrot
hero_caption: Rosalba Carriera. A Young Lady with a Parrot, 1730. The Regenstein Collection.
short_description: Join Xavier F. Salomon, deputy director and Peter Jay Sharp Chief Curator at the Frick Collection, and Jamie Gabbarelli, Prince Trust Associate Curator of Prints and Drawings, as they discuss highlights from the Prints and Drawings collection.
list_description: Join Xavier F. Salomon, deputy director and Peter Jay Sharp Chief Curator at the Frick Collection, and Jamie Gabbarelli, Prince Trust Associate Curator of Prints and Drawings, as they discuss highlights from the Prints and Drawings collection.
description:
Join Xavier F. Salomon, deputy director and Peter Jay Sharp Chief Curator at the Frick Collection, and Jamie Gabbarelli, Prince Trust Associate Curator of Prints and Drawings, as they discuss one of the highlights of the Prints and Drawings collection: Rosalba Carriera’s graceful and seductive pastel portrait, A Young Lady with a Parrot, a work that exemplifies why Carriera was one of the most renowned artists of her time.

About the Speaker

Please note that all event times listed are in central time.

We recommend using a laptop or desktop computer and downloading the latest version of Zoom to enjoy this program.
